title: Experimental Design Methods for Science Education Using Mobile Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Science Knowledge and Digital Device Proficiency
context.additional_context: Learners participate in science education as general citizens, focusing on mobile learning experiment design using provided digital devices. Continuous feedback is provided through formative assessments.

learning_goals: One can design science education experiments applying mobile learning environments.
In experimental research design, one can explain criteria for evaluating statistical validity.
One can establish a research plan considering core elements of experimental design, such as sample size, reliability, and validity.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
